topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: KYchat
short_description:
KYchat is an evolution of the old irc client mIRC (TM). 
The goal is to make a MDI IM (IRC, MSN, ICQ) client that is easy on memory, extremely fast, and will run on linux or win32 platforms.
